data.title: Burnt Wood Studio
data.meta_description: Burnt Wood Studio is the online showcase of artwork produced by Adelaide-based artist Heath Carter.
data.text:
The drummer of the band Mudvayne, this is the first of a series of four drawings of the individual members of the band, to be released as a series of nine prints of the four drawings joined as one.

I believe Mudvayne come from Iowa, which is where by brother and his family reside, even though they have never heard of the them. I first heard Mudvayne at work a couple of days after they toured Australia with the Big Day Out, which I was not at. I immediately regretted not going to the BDO, and was sold from that moment on their music.
